channel.title: Final fantasy for xbox 360(opinions)
channel.description:
Has anyone tried this game??
if so is it any good?
and it IS an mmorpg right??
everything i read about this game doesnt say much because they expect me to have played all FF games before
(i havnt ever played FF by the way so im an FF noob)
All coments or links to good reviews are apreciated,thx in advance
EDIT: also do u have to pay anything more then xbox live to play online??

item.title: Final fantasy for xbox 360(opinions)
item.dc:creator: @Evil1 Evil_
item.description:
@Evil1 wrote:

if you are talking about FFXI(Final Fantasy 11) then HELL YES! it is awesome, I still play it every now and then

I never played it on 360, but it costs like…$15 to play…a month, $10 more than RS, but its HELLA worth it! awesome graphix and people arent assholes like they are on runescape. IMO its ALL worth the money. If you play, and get on Seraph server, holla at me

My name on there is Chaster (was a randomly generated name :P)

Read full topic
